text.section: Not more than 80% of the residents of a housing project may have incomes above the levels for persons of eligible income.
The listing of powers in this section does not imply that the exercise of those powers by the Baltimore Authority before July 1, 1990, was unauthorized.
The power of the Baltimore Authority to rent housing to persons of eligible income is not limited by § 12-402 of this article.
